name: Dirty Dans
description:
A co op game where both players are stuck together with a pair of guns and a (weaponized)  laser chain binding them.

S/Down arrow - Skip dialogue

Player1:

W - Jump

A - Move left

D - Move right

Left Ctrl - Shoot

Player2:

Up Arrow - Jump

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Right Ctrl - Shoot

Background:

Dan

Dan is a solo criminal. He was being pursued by the CAI (Central Agency of Intelligence). He led them on a lovely chase over the river and through the woods, but was caught at grandmother's house.  He was imprisoned at Prison Bebop, where he was cellmates with Danny. They bonded over their crimes and shared name to form an escape plan. All they needed were a couple guns and a lot of dead guards.

Danny

Danny mid-level member of the mob. He tried to seize power but failed splendidly. The mob sent him to prison to teach him a lesson. Here he met Dan, his cellmate. They bonded over a love of crime and other Dan things. They soon formed a Dan-gerous duo busted out of prison together, with naught but a couple of handguns and their laser ankle restraint to wreak havoc.
